4.4 Calcium supplements in pregnant women
WHO RECOMMENDATION
Supplementation of pregnant women with 1.5 to 2.0 grams of elemental calcium per day 
is recommended in areas where dietary calcium intake is low and for women at high risk 
of developing hypertensive disorders during pregnancy ( 188, 189).1 
The recommended dose is of three tablets three times per day, preferably with meals, for 
the duration of the pregnancy to achieve daily intake of 1.5
